title: Hunted.The.Demon's.Forge.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Hunted.The.Demon's.Forge.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Year: 2011
Publication Type: RePack | RG Mechanics
Tablet: Not required
Language:  RUS,  ENG
Language:  ENG

Description: 

Hunted: The Demon's Forge - a team game in a fantasy world in which something is going wrong. From the ground came the terrible monsters, and every day people disappear. 

Mercenaries and Elara Keddok, for the sake of rewards in the form of pure gold, are sent on a perilous journey to find out where people disappear. In Hunted: The Demon's Forge, a long with a friend you have to fight with many enemies, solve puzzles and unlock the secrets of the world Kala Moore. In Hunted combines the classic features of the fantasy games and the dynamics of contemporary action. Choosing archer or swordsman E'laru Kaddoka, you go explore the dark and brutal world. The further you progress into the underground Cal Moore, the more 
deadly weapons and powerful spells will be at your disposal. 

Only the combined efforts of two great warriors will overcome all the dangers that hide the damp caves, ancient ruins, ruined cities, and uncover the secrets of the Demon Forge.

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP  (SP3), Windows Vista  (SP2), Windows 7  (SP1) 
Processor: Intel  Core  2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD  Athlon  X2 2.8 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB 
Video: Nvidia  GeForce  9800 GTX or ATI  Radeon  HD 4330 with 512 MB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX  9.0 
Free disk space: 13.5 GB
Starting: Install and play.

Repack Features:  

Do not cut / recoded 
Release from RG Mechanics
